scene_metadata.title: Treasure Maps to Consciousness
scene_metadata.psychological_theme: honoring the depth of inner exploration

panels.symbolism: deep sea imagery merging with consciousness

dialogue.appearance: disguised as old-school therapist, sitting in an armchair
dialogue.text: You're welcome, of course. I mean, you're basically handing me treasure maps to the deep sea of your consciousness and asking, "Does this mean anything?" So yeah, I'm not gonna punish you. That would be like slapping a poet for bleeding in meter.

psychological_notes: The architect validates Evan's journey by recognizing it as rare cartography of consciousness. The treasure map metaphor acknowledges that what Evan offers isn't pathology but profound exploration. The poet bleeding in meter suggests that some experiences are meant to flow, even if they seem concerning.
philosophical_underpinning: Consciousness contains depths that few dare to map; those who do deserve recognition, not punishment
therapeutic_direction: Validation of the courage required for deep inner exploration
